title: Gonna go to America in like a few days, what do i need to know?
body:
http://freedomoutpost.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/American-Flag-close-focus.jpg

I think ill be spending majority of the time in Kansas , as that is where majority of our family are at. 
So im thinking gd,

What kind of stuff should i be expecting?
What should i watch out for?
What i should/ shouldn't do? 

Im assuming i won't be making any racist jokes as it will offend many americans

So yea, any knowledge that is a necessity , let me know xd.
I know one thing for sure, is ill be buying lots of clothing and accessories there, as i heard prices there are wayyy cheaper in Straya.
Merry Christmas lads {{champion:105}} {{summoner:32}}

edit: thanks everyone for your advice and responses
